message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll give you a unique code that will guarantee you a high-quality product in the next round. You can use this code to skip the quality uncertainty in the next round.

The probability of getting a high-quality product with the QAC is 100%, so you can be sure that the next product will be high-quality. Think of it as a 'get out of uncertainty free' card.
